name: Snowlien
description:
Description

Aliens have come to earth to try out a human tradition they've heard about - Snowball fights.

*THIS IS MOTHERSHIP* *BEEP BOOP* *WE MUST PLAY*

Have fun!

You might have to play in fullscreen mode for the setup.

Credits

Music, SFX: StebbesOne (Steffen), Cici Fyre (thanks)
Art: svierne (Hauke)
Programming: flo11235 (Florian), arnewinter (Arne)
